TopicTitle: New mod series! Mission Controller, FAR and more!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I'm off to college for Aerospace Engineering and I figured it would be interesting if I did some recording on a modded KSP. I do some talking on real life NASA missions, explain what some of the numbers and figures mean, and work on a brand new mission control mod career. Hope you guys enjoy and feel free to comment with any suggestions or stuff you would like to see. A like or subscription goes a long way too, if you enjoy it!

Episode 1 here:

Release schedule is pretty irregular for the moment, but after I get a bit into it I'm looking at weekly and doing a second series in between.
